contentBlocks.title: For Class 2 Buildings
items: The building (excluding SOUs), including its services, must have features that facilitate the efficient use of energy appropriate to:
(a) the function and use of the building; and
(b) the level of human comfort required for the building use; and
(c) solar radiation being (i) utilised for heating; and (ii) controlled to minimise energy for cooling; and
(d) the energy source of the services; and
(e) the sealing of the building envelope against air leakage.

contentBlocks.title: For Class 6 Buildings
items: Features must facilitate the efficient use of energy appropriate to:
(a) the function and use of the building; and
(b) the level of human comfort required for the building use; and
(c) solar radiation being (i) utilised for heating; and (ii) controlled to minimise energy for cooling; and
(d) the energy source of the services; and
(e) the sealing of the building envelope against air leakage.
Additionally, for conditioned spaces, Class 6 buildings must have an energy use limit of 80 kJ/m²·hr.
